description:
A mysterious old man holds the secret to restoring Gao. Gao and his friends investigate a series of spooky events plaguing Aibo Academy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Terror from the Toilet! Aibo Academy is Full of Ghosts!
Toilet no Kyoufu! Aibou Gakuen wa Obake Darake!?
トイレの恐怖! 相棒学園はオバケだらけ!?
